feed.title: LatinX in AI (LXAI) Research
feed.subtitle: This is a publication of accepted research papers for official LatinX in AI (LXAI) workshops co-located with prestigious AI and ML conferences held globally and virtually.

entry.title: Analysis of factors that influence the performance of biometric systems based on EEG signals
